handler.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who trains an animal, especially a dog
handler.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who touches, carries, or moves things as their job
handler.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: All food handlers should be properly trained.
handler.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who helps and advises an important person
handler.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: She is kept well away from the press by her handlers.
